eq_lim_at_right_extend_from_Ioo:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within.lt -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem eq_lim_at_right_extend_from_Ioo [topological_space α] [linear_order α] [DenselyOrdered α] [order_topology α]
    [topological_space β] [t2_space β] {f : α → β} {a b : α} {lb : β} (hab : a < b)
    (hb : tendsto f (nhds_within.lt b) ((nhds) lb)) : extend_from (Ioo a b) f b = lb :=
  by
  apply extend_from_eq
  · rw [closure_Ioo hab.ne]
    simp only [le_of_lt hab, left_mem_Icc, right_mem_Icc]
  · simpa [hab]
#align eq_lim_at_right_extend_from_Ioo eq_lim_at_right_extend_from_Ioo
eq_lim_at_left_extend_from_Ioo:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within.gt -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem eq_lim_at_left_extend_from_Ioo [topological_space α] [linear_order α] [DenselyOrdered α] [order_topology α]
    [topological_space β] [t2_space β] {f : α → β} {a b : α} {la : β} (hab : a < b)
    (ha : tendsto f (nhds_within.gt a) ((nhds) la)) : extend_from (Ioo a b) f a = la :=
  by
  apply extend_from_eq
  · rw [closure_Ioo hab.ne]
    simp only [le_of_lt hab, left_mem_Icc, right_mem_Icc]
  · simpa [hab]
#align eq_lim_at_left_extend_from_Ioo eq_lim_at_left_extend_from_Ioo
continuous_on_Ioc_extend_from_Ioo:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᵒᵈ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within.lt -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem continuous_on_Ioc_extend_from_Ioo [topological_space α] [linear_order α] [DenselyOrdered α] [order_topology α]
    [topological_space β] [regular_space β] {f : α → β} {a b : α} {lb : β} (hab : a < b)
    (hf : continuous_on f (Ioo a b)) (hb : tendsto f (nhds_within.lt b) ((nhds) lb)) :
    continuous_on (extend_from (Ioo a b) f) (Ioc a b) :=
  by
  have := @continuous_on_Ico_extend_from_Ioo («expr ᵒᵈ» α) _ _ _ _ _ _ _ f _ _ _ hab
  erw [dual_Ico, dual_Ioi, dual_Ioo] at this
  exact this hf hb
#align continuous_on_Ioc_extend_from_Ioo continuous_on_Ioc_extend_from_Ioo
continuous_on_Ico_extend_from_Ioo:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within.gt -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem continuous_on_Ico_extend_from_Ioo [topological_space α] [linear_order α] [DenselyOrdered α] [order_topology α]
    [topological_space β] [regular_space β] {f : α → β} {a b : α} {la : β} (hab : a < b)
    (hf : continuous_on f (Ioo a b)) (ha : tendsto f (nhds_within.gt a) ((nhds) la)) :
    continuous_on (extend_from (Ioo a b) f) (Ico a b) :=
  by
  apply continuous_on_extend_from
  · rw [closure_Ioo hab.ne]
    exact Ico_subset_Icc_self
  · intro x x_in
    rcases eq_left_or_mem_Ioo_of_mem_Ico x_in with (rfl | h)
    · use la
      simpa [hab]
    · use f x, hf x h
#align continuous_on_Ico_extend_from_Ioo continuous_on_Ico_extend_from_Ioo
continuous_on_Icc_extend_from_Ioo:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within.gt -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds_within.lt -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2017 Johannes Hölzl. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Johannes Hölzl, Mario Carneiro, Yury Kudryashov
-/
theorem continuous_on_Icc_extend_from_Ioo [topological_space α] [linear_order α] [DenselyOrdered α] [order_topology α]
    [topological_space β] [regular_space β] {f : α → β} {a b : α} {la lb : β} (hab : a ≠ b)
    (hf : continuous_on f (Ioo a b)) (ha : tendsto f (nhds_within.gt a) ((nhds) la))
    (hb : tendsto f (nhds_within.lt b) ((nhds) lb)) : continuous_on (extend_from (Ioo a b) f) (Icc a b) :=
  by
  apply continuous_on_extend_from
  · rw [closure_Ioo hab]
  · intro x x_in
    rcases eq_endpoints_or_mem_Ioo_of_mem_Icc x_in with (rfl | rfl | h)
    · exact ⟨la, ha.mono_left <| nhds_within_mono _ Ioo_subset_Ioi_self⟩
    · exact ⟨lb, hb.mono_left <| nhds_within_mono _ Ioo_subset_Iio_self⟩
    · use f x, hf x h
#align continuous_on_Icc_extend_from_Ioo continuous_on_Icc_extend_from_Ioo
